text: We have $$\begin{aligned} \sum_{n=1}^{\infty} \frac{n}{n^{4}+4} & =\sum_{n=1}^{\infty} \frac{n}{\left(n^{2}+2 n+2\right)\left(n^{2}-2 n+2\right)} \\ & =\frac{1}{4} \sum_{n=1}^{\infty}\left(\frac{1}{n^{2}-2 n+2}-\frac{1}{n^{2}+2 n+2}\right) \\ & =\frac{1}{4} \sum_{n=1}^{\infty}\left(\frac{1}{(n-1)^{2}+1}-\frac{1}{(n+1)^{2}+1}\right) \end{aligned}$$ Observe that the sum telescopes.
